question: India's first-ever digitised Panchayat ward has come up in which of the following states?
explanation: The Aymanam grama panchayat of ward No. 15 in Kerala has become the India\'s first-ever digitised Panchayat ward. For this, Krishan Pal Gurjar  (the Union minister of state for social justice and empowerment) has launched the  website of the first digitalized panchayat ward number 15 of Aymanam grama panchayat “www.digitalaymanam.com” at a function held at a temple premises in Kottayam  district. The website also contains information about blood donors\' forum and telephone directory of the people of the ward.
